remarks:
Closure law for ordinal multiplication.  Proposition 8.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 57.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.) 

---

 Closure law for ordinal multiplication.  Proposition 8.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 57.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2004.)  (Constructive proof by Jim Kingdon, 26-Jul-2019.)
statement: omcl $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( A .o B ) e. On ) $.
